title: "Kay Firth-Butterfield Is Shaping Responsible AI Governance"
excerpt: "Human brains are still the dominant mode of intelligence on earth at the dawn of 2024, but perhaps—at least according to some AI experts—not for much longer. Recent advances in AI have led governments around the world to come to the same conclusion that Firth-Butterfield came to in 2011: “We [need to] set out now what we humans want in our lives with AI."
